title: The Apartment
description: Trapped in an elevator in a borrowed apartment, a young woman battles to keep her sanity while attempting to come to terms with all she has lost. When Laura's friend Marianne suggests she joins her for a few days in a multi-million-dollar apartment on the shores of Lake Wakatipu, it doesn't take Laura long to think about the offer and come up with a yes.However, soon after Marianne leaves at the end of a supposedly relaxing vacation, Laura finds herself alone and trapped between floors in the apartment's private elevator. This should be Laura's worst nightmare but things go from bad to terrifying when two intruders let themselves into what they think is an empty apartment and Laura is forced to face yet more unpleasant truths.As her grip on reality gradually slips away, she realizes there is no way out...
author: Cherie Mitchell
